16  return (-1);

18  std::cout<<"size of input cloud: "<<cloud->size()<<std::endl;

20  params.zmin = 0.03;
21  params.zmax = 2.0;
22  params.th_points = 50;
23  params.voxel_resolution = 0.0075f;
24  params.seed_resolution = 0.015f;
25  params.color_importance = 0.0f;

29  params.use_sanity_criterion = true;
30  params.concavity_tolerance_threshold = 10;
31  params.smoothness_threshold = 0.1f;
32  params.min_segment_size = 3;
33 
34  Segmentation* seg = new Segmentation(cloud, params);
35  seg->segment();
36 
37  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());

39  std::cout<<"Size of table cloud: "<<table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
40 
41  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_on_table_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
42  seg->getObjectsOnTable(object_on_table_cloud);
43  std::cout<<"Size of cloud on table: "<<object_on_table_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
44 
45  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr object_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());

47  std::cout<<"Size of segmented objects cloud: "<<object_cloud->points.size()<<std::endl;
48 
49  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> objects;

51  std::cout<<"Detected objects: "<<objects.size()<<std::endl;

53 
54 
55
